definition: to enjoy (i.e. have the use or benefit of)
to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Simply pour ingredients, add ice, stir, and enjoy!
sentences.chinese: 簡單的混合原料，加冰塊，攪合，享用。

sentences.english: "Lucrece, " quoth he, "this night I must enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 佳麗，今夜，你須歸我享用。

sentences.english: Respectfully requests, and praying fathers come to enjoy the family size peace, prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 恭請祖宗降臨享用，並祈保合家大小平安，興旺發達。

sentences.english: One free draft beer for purchasing draft beer at Lunch time in De Bistro .
sentences.chinese: 會員在西餐廳享用午餐時，買扎啤可免費贈送一杯。

sentences.english: It suspends its victims from the cave ceiling until it is ready to feast.
sentences.chinese: 它把獵物吊在洞頂上，直到要享用時才取下來。

sentences.english: Then we relaxed and enjoyed our lunch to the sound of screeching sea birds and crashing waves.
sentences.chinese: 然後自在地在海鳥尖聲鳴叫和拍浪聲中享用午餐。

sentences.english: An attractive, nutritious breakfast fit for a queen.
sentences.chinese: 好一份適合女王享用而誘人的營養早餐。

sentences.english: Be shy of favours bestowed at the expense of others.
sentences.chinese: 享用借花獻佛的恩惠是要付出代價的。

sentences.english: The strong feast on their carcasses.
Air France passengers are treated to a delectable spread and smiling service.
sentences.chinese: 法航的旅客享用機上美食，並和空姐微笑交談。

sentences.english: Girls enjoy the clean water from the new water points in Tianfala.
sentences.chinese: 姜法拉的一個新取水點，女孩們正在享用清潔的水源。

sentences.english: For a treat, I like to feast on wild honey and bees.
sentences.chinese: 要是想犒勞一下自己，我喜歡享用野蜂蜜和蜜蜂。

sentences.english: You should enjoy free lunch, what have to allow a family to open your home is postern .
sentences.chinese: 你要享用免費的午餐，就得允許人家打開你家的後門。

sentences.english: Some went to have a lunch in nearby pancake bars.
sentences.chinese: 有些人在附近的餡餅餐廳享用午餐。

sentences.english: Pour the sauce over the tomatoes and beans. Toss the salad well and serve.
sentences.chinese: 把醬潑在西紅柿和菜豆上，拌一拌就可以享用了。

sentences.english: Guests can benefit from a fully-equipped kitchen and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 客人可以享用帶洗碗機的設備齊全的小廚房。

definition: to taste a small amount/to sample
to chew on a large slab (idiom); a large mouthful is hard to chew/to tuck into a great meal
to eat one's fill/to be full
delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat
